word: I am instructed to say to our people, Gather together from the Scriptures the proofs that God has sanctified the Sabbath, and let the words of the Lord be read before the congregations, showing that all who turn aside from a plain \93Thus saith the Lord\94 will be condemned. The Sabbath has been the test of the loyalty of God\92s people in all ages. \93It is a sign between me and the children of Israel for ever,\94 the Lord declares.
